dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Welcome! I am Morg'eean the kobold trader. I trade various goods between Asteria and Brynknot using my ship.
I also have a small shop in my cellar.

dialog.name: useship
dialog.message: Hmm... well, the business is slow right now, so I don't need it at the moment. Feel free to use it to sail to Brynknot.

You can find a spare key in my chest with goods which will open the gate. Don't worry, the ship has an enchantment! It can travel between Brynknot and Asteria by itself, no steering necessary. I can also recall it if need be! That was a costly enchantment, though...

dialog.name: aboutshop
dialog.message: It's just below this house, down the stairs. Feel free to have a look around!
I'll be especially pleased if you buy some of my goods!
